name: Chicken Tetrazzini
author: Louise Alderman

ingredients.name: can of cream of chicken soup (undiluted)

instructions: In a large pan melt butter and add soups. Remove from heat and add rest of ingredients except cheese. Pour into greased casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Bake uncovered at 350Â° for 35 to 40 minutes or until bubbly. If made ahead and refrigerated, it will take longer to bake.
